content:
A frozen version of the FHIR for FAIR Implementation Guide for the January ballot is now available for your peer review at https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-for-fair/
The formal SOA WG approval for the ballot is due by the next December 2nd.

If you are going to contribute directly in GitHub pls do not use in this phase the master branch but in the ballot-wip one
GitHub : https://github.com/HL7/fhir-for-fair/tree/ballot-wip
Publication in https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-for-fair/branches/ballot-wip/
@Giorgio Cangioli Where do I submit my comments (before ballot opens)?
Hi @Yunwei Wang We have not agreed a specific way to do it.. we just said to not use in this phase the confluence pages
you can informally send an email to me as someone did
or you can use the github issues if we'd like to keep track of the request
